ygData.subject: Re: Guild News
ygData.msgSnippet: HHMMM, I think if you sell the account that your 50th level character is on you will have to go and buy a new copy of EQ to play.  Now if you just wanted to
ygData.messageBody:
HHMMM, I think if you sell the account that your 50th level character is on
you will have to go and buy a new copy of EQ to play. Now if you just
wanted to start a new character on one of the other servers... Just hold on
to you 50th. The add-on should be out by March. I'm not sure if you have
more than one character now, but starting over again can be very
disenchanting sometimes.
Just a thought.

Greg


> From: J Dye <gaelad@...>
>
> Just a little catch up -- I've not been on in a while
> since my hand was broken. (It's hard to click the
> mouse with a cast on.) =)
>
> I am also leaving Xegony for good, so I am selling my
> account that has my level 50 on it and starting a new
> account on one of the other servers ~ (I think).
>
> Gaelad
>
